        protected Derived(BlockHeader header, SourceBlocks sourceBlocks) : base(header, sourceBlocks)
        {

            if (sourceBlock.Length < BlockLength)

                // source too small - allocate new
                _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
                sourceBlock.CopyTo(_writableLocalBlock);

                _writableLocalBlock = Memory<byte>.Empty;

        {
            BlobIdV1 blobId = default;

            var blob = await dataStore.GetBlob(blobId);

            _Field11 = blob is null ? string.Empty : System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetString(blob.Value);
#else
            _Field11 = blob is null ? string.Empty : System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetString(blob.Value.ToArray());
#endif
